Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Healing place. I was tired after setting a difficult display for an exhibition. Just wanted a good meal, and Ethiopian food is my favourite. I stepped in, me alone, many tables reserved. I have been invited to seat at a big table for ‚Ä¶

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text:
Delicious!

And they even asked us for our COVID QR code. Thank you for caring about our safety!.

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Amazing food, good portions and a variety of ethiopian beer. The staff is also very friendly. Will visit again.

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Food was absolutely delicious and the staff are very nice and helpful. Will definitely be coming back!

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Very friendly service, best Ethiopian food I ever ate. Tasty local beers, yummy injeera

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: I had a great evening with our stagiere and a colleage. He introduced us to ( for me) totally new and tasty food from Africa. I loved it, and we will come back for sure. The lady that helped us was very kind. Prices on the menu are not expensive at all. Try it people !!

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: she is an ambasaador for authentic original taste of habesha fine dinning in the entire city.the one and only.the stew she make is tantalizing finger leaking sweet,her kitfo is wowooooooo

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Really tasty Ethiopian dishes and a unique experience. We took the mix of 8 vegetarian dishes served with injera bread which I certainly recommend. Very friendly people, great service and a nice and cosy interior!

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text:
When you are done with stamppot and chicken satai and need some tasty spicy food my recommendation is Ethiopian and eastern African food.
We ordered take-out during the Covid outbreak and got the vegan combo. It was ‚Ä¶

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Food was tasty sadly didn't have our first choice in stock.

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: The best Ethiopian dish I've ever had. the food is very tasty and diverse, especially the meat is excellent.  The staff are also very friendly. It's already on my top list in Amsterdam's exotic restaurants!

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Amazing food. Lovely tables. The atmosphere is great together with the music. Will definitely go there again.

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: A proper Ethiopian and Eritrean food to have in Amsterdam.

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: The food was quite good. Although the item I chose was not much to my liking. The service was average. The prices were ok.

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Really tasty Ethiopian food!

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Service was good. Food was ok (the lamb had too many bones). Lacks a bit of atmosphere, some music would help.

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Live in the area and walked past this place for months. It is always quiet so did not go in. But tonight was the night. Its was really good food. Will go back again.

Name: Selam Habesha Restaurant
Review Text: Really nice service, tasty food. Can recommend the meat and vegetarian platters!

Review Text: Delicious Ethiopian food, prepared with love.

Review Text: Tried for the first time at street market and would not have found it otherwise. We enjoyed so much that we found the restaurant and will be repeat customers.
